MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:46 PM. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5 PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:57 PM on 19th February 2021.
